alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Eastern Clay; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 3:27PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Clay and eastern Duval Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 327 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ortega, or near Jacksonville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Orange Park, Unf, Arlington, Jacksonville Beach, Atlantic Beach, Neptune Beach, Baymeadows, Mayport and Ortega. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Eastern Clay; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval
